wikipedia_page.main: Charles Herbert James (16 June 1817 – 10 October 1890) was a Welsh politician. He was elected as a Liberal Member of Parliament for Merthyr Tydfil in 1880, resigning in 1888 by becoming Steward of the Manor of Northstead.
